banner.title: Since 1992 accompanying our clients in customs procedures

cta.title:old: We offer an efficient service within the framework of secure trade
cta.title: Learn about our services

features.subone: We provide consultation and information services on processes related to customs regimes.
features.subtwo: All services related to the process of customs regimes for the import/export of merchandise.
features.subthree: Change of customs regime, inspection, import and export permits, vehicle license plate and more.

cta.footer: Learn about our services and advice

services.title: We provide an efficient and safe service in the safe trading framework
services.one: Members of the Dominican Association of Customs Agents, the International Association of authorized economic, customs and logistics operators; and the General Directorate of Customs.
services.two: One of the first Dominican customs agencies to be certified as an Authorized Economic Operator (O.E.A).
services.three: We have a license to operate in all ports of the country.
